translation.en: ♪ We're gonna make it home ♪
-♪ We're gonna make it home... ♪ -Run complete.
[automated voice] Well done, Emily. Five point three miles. Forty-one minutes.
translation.zh: ‎好样的 艾米丽 ‎总共8.5公里 41分钟

translation.en: Eighteen seconds faster than yesterday.
-Good effort. -[exhales]
-[indistinct chatter] -[gasps] Madeline, you're in Adweek.
translation.zh: ‎玛德琳 你上了《广告周刊》

translation.en: What? Where?
Right here, under "Movers and Shakers."
-[Madeline] Ah! -"Chicago-based Gilbert Group expands international portfolio
translation.zh:
‎“总部位于芝加哥的吉尔伯特集团
‎成功扩张国际企业版图

translation.en: with acquisition of French luxury marketing company Savoir.
translation.zh: ‎收购法国奢华品牌营销公司萨维尔

translation.en: Gilbert Group vet, Madeline Wheeler,
translation.zh: ‎吉尔伯特集团资深领导玛德琳惠勒

translation.en: named director of marketing for Franco firm."
translation.zh: ‎获委任为该法国公司市场营销经理”

translation.en: Yes! I am here to prove
that a master's in French does not go to waste.
-This is going to be amazing for you. -[Madeline sighs]
I have been dreaming of moving to Paris forever.
translation.zh: ‎我这一生都梦想搬到巴黎居住

translation.en: I mean, French men, they love older women, you know?
translation.zh: ‎法国男人都爱年纪较大的女人

translation.en: Look at their president. He's young. He's hot. -He married his schoolteacher. -[Emily laughs]
translation.zh:
‎瞧瞧法国总统
‎年轻帅气 却娶了中学老师

translation.en: Ooh, I just emailed you my thoughts on the presentation for the new IBS drug.
translation.zh:
‎我刚把对新大肠激躁症药简报的感想
‎透过电邮发给你了

translation.en: It's a social initiative to add meditation to your medication.
translation.zh: ‎结合冥想与药物治疗是社会倡议

translation.en: If you like it, you can pitch it later. Uh, you know, for your last hurrah.
translation.zh:
‎待会你大可向客户推这点
‎就当是你在这家公司的最后一战

translation.en: -I want you to pitch it. -Seriously?
Seriously. The client has to start getting comfortable with you.
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-真的 ‎客户开始对你有信心了

translation.en: I don't want to step on your toes.
You're not. You're stepping into my shoes. You're ready, okay?
translation.zh:
‎你没有逾越本分 你只是替代我
‎我看你准备好了

translation.en: This is an opportunity for both of us. Come here. Try this.
translation.zh:
‎这对我俩来说都是大好机会
‎过来 我要你试试这个

translation.en: What is it? De L'Heure.
It's the latest fragrance from Maison Lavaux.
I'll be handling them, their account in Paris. What do you think?
translation.zh:
‎我会负责这款香水在法国的营销业务
‎你有什么看法？

translation.en: It's like wearing poetry.
[snaps fingers] I'm gonna use that.
Oh, that smells really wei-- Does that smell weird to you?
translation.zh: ‎闻起来怪怪的 你怎么看？

translation.en: -No, just floral. -But...
I'm gonna be sick. Uh... I'm gonna be sick.
-Hi, babe! -[boyfriend] Hey. Oh.
-Yes! -What happened?
Bote just smacked a walk-off grand slam, two outs left in the bottom of the ninth.
translation.zh: ‎博特刚击出了一记再见全垒打！ ‎九局下 两出局

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -Hell yeah!
Yeah! Cubs are goin' to the playoffs, baby!
translation.zh: ‎小熊队将进入季后赛 宝贝！

translation.en: -Can we get a couple of beers here? -[Emily] White wine, actually.
translation.zh:
‎-可以来几杯啤酒吗？
‎-给我一杯白葡萄酒

translation.en: -Anything French, if you have it. -[server] For sure.
translation.zh:
‎-只要是法国葡萄酒都行
‎-没问题

translation.en: I have some crazy news.
-Madeline's pregnant. -Madeline?
-[Emily] Mm-hm. -Like, your boss, Madeline?
-Thought she was too old to get pregnant. -Well, so did she.
translation.zh: ‎我以为她年纪大不会怀孕了 ‎她也是这么想的

translation.en: Until she got completely nauseous sniffing this perfume
translation.zh:
‎直到她闻了某一款
‎她将负责推销的香水吐得激情四射

translation.en: she was planning to promote. She went to the doctor this afternoon.
translation.zh:
‎直到她闻了某一款
‎她将负责推销的香水吐得激情四射 ‎下午她到诊所确定了

translation.en: -Wow. So, who's the dad? -Oh, well, there are a few candidates.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊 孩子的爸是谁？
‎-有好几个人选

translation.en: -She was having a lot of going-away sex. -Hey. Go, Madeline.
translation.zh: ‎她有很多一夜情对象 ‎玛德琳真厉害

translation.en: But now that she's pregnant, she's decided she's not gonna take the job in Paris.
translation.zh: ‎如今她怀孕了 于是她决定 ‎不去巴黎工作了

translation.en: So, there goes your promotion?
[Emily] Not exactly. They still need someone there.
translation.zh: ‎不能这么说 公司还需要派人到法国

translation.en: Like, American eyes and ears to help with the whole transition.
translation.zh:
‎提供美国方面的意见
‎让整个转型过程更顺利

translation.en: So they asked me if I would take the job...
translation.zh: ‎于是高层问我愿不愿意接下这份工作

translation.en: for a year.
What? In Paris? [chuckles]
They said that if I did
that they'd guarantee me senior brand manager when I'm back.
translation.zh: ‎回来后他们保证升我为高级品牌经理

translation.en: So, the apartment there is already all set up,
translation.zh: ‎法国那边公寓已经准备好了

translation.en: and there's a relocation bonus.
And just to explore the idea,
here's a spreadsheet I made for the next year.
translation.zh: ‎这是我为明年做好的行事历

translation.en: Weeks when you might be able to come to Paris,
times I can come back to Chicago,
translation.zh: ‎哪几个星期我可以回到芝加哥

translation.en: taking into consideration vacation and sick days.
Wait.
You're serious?
I know it's crazy, but when will we get a chance like this?
translation.zh: ‎我知道这很不可思议 ‎但这是千载难逢的机会 不是吗？

translation.en: -It'll be an adventure. -[boyfriend] Unless I missed something,
you don't speak French.
Fake it till you make it. [chuckles]
You look worried.
Oh, I'm not worried. It's the French who should be worried.
translation.zh: ‎我不担心 ‎那些法国人才应该担心

translation.en: -Uh, Emily Cooper? -[Emily] Yes.
Hey. I'm Gilles Dufour from the rental agency.
translation.zh: ‎我是租房中介公司的吉尔杜福

translation.en: -I've got your keys. Apartment 501. -["Summer in Paris" playing]
-Hi. -♪ A s'il vous plaît ♪
-♪ Goes a long way... ♪ -The building is very old.
-It doesn't have an elevator. -[panting] Okay.
It's charming. [grunts]
[groans] Is this it?
[panting] It's on the fifth floor.
-This is the fourth floor. -[Emily] Uh,
I just schlepped up these bags five flights. -This is the fifth floor. -[Gilles sighs]
translation.zh:
‎虽然我拖着这些行李转了五趟航班
‎但我很确定这是五楼

translation.en: In France, first the ground floor,
then the first floor, then the second floor, and so on.
translation.zh: ‎再来才是一楼、二楼 以此类推

translation.en: That's weird.
Chambre de what now?
Chambre de b-- Um, it means, uh, the room for the housekeeper.
translation.zh: ‎“保姆房”是指给保姆住的房间

translation.en: The top two floors were typically reserved for the servants.
The space is small, but the view...
Oh, my God, I feel like Nicole Kidman in Moulin Rouge!
translation.zh:
‎天啊 我感觉自己
‎像《红磨坊》里的妮可基德曼

translation.en: You've got all of Paris at your feet.
There is a wonderful café just down below.
-A friend of mine is the manager. -[Emily] Wow.
-So, ça va ? It's good? -[Emily takes a deep breath]
Oui. Oui. Très good.
-Très wonderful. [chuckles] -Great.
Are you hungry? Would you like to have a coffee or...?
translation.zh: ‎饿了吗？ ‎要不要喝杯咖啡或者…

translation.en: Oh, actually, I have to get to my office.
Oh. Maybe you want to have a drink tonight?
I have a boyfriend.
-In Paris? -[Emily] In Chicago.
-So you don't have a boyfriend in Paris. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: ‎意思是你在巴黎没有男朋友

translation.en: -Can I just get my keys, s'il vous plaît ? -[Gilles] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-请把钥匙交给我 好吗？
‎-好

translation.en: Um, my number is on the card if you need me for anything,
translation.zh:
‎名片上有我的联络号码
‎如果有事 或者改变主意

translation.en: -and in case you change your mind. -I won't.
-Bye-bye, now. -Yeah.
-["Lunatique" playing] -[camera shutter clicks]
Hi. Hello.
Uh, bonjour. I'm Emily Cooper from the Gilbert Group in Chicago.
translation.zh:
‎你好 我是艾米丽库珀
‎来自芝加哥吉尔伯特集团

translation.en: You are? [chuckles] I'm sorry. I don't understand.
translation.zh: ‎你是…不好意思 我听不懂

translation.en: -I'm going to be working in this office. -[cell phone beeps]
-[line beeps] -[in French] The American girl is here.
I wasn't expecting you until tomorrow.
How was your journey here? The new apartment and everything?
translation.zh: ‎行程顺利吗？新公寓还适应吗？

translation.en: [in English, chuckling] You lost me at bonjour.
Yeah, I was told the American coming here spoke French.
translation.zh: ‎我以为来这里的美国人会说法语

translation.en: Oh, that was Madeline.
Oh, so you're not Madeline.
Uh, I'm Emily. Emily Cooper. And I am so excited to be here.
translation.zh: ‎我是艾米丽库珀 很高兴能来到这里

translation.en: Well, that's very unfortunate. [sighs softly]
-Excuse me? -That you don't speak French.
It's a problem.
Well, I'm going to take a class, but... [American accent] ...je parle un peu français already.
translation.zh:
‎我打算去上法语课
‎不过其实我会说一点法语

translation.en: Well, perhaps it's better not to try.
-[knocking on door] -Oh, Paul.
May I introduce Emily,
translation.zh: ‎介绍给你认识 她是艾米丽

translation.en: the American girl who's come to work with us?
translation.zh: ‎来和我们一起工作的美国姑娘

translation.en: This is Monsieur Brossard, he's the founder of Savoir.
translation.zh:
‎他是萨维尔公司的创办人
‎布洛萨德先生

translation.en: -Ah. Emily Cooper. Oh. -[Paul] Hello.
It is so nice to meet you, Monsieur Brossard.
translation.zh: ‎布洛萨德先生 很高兴见到你

translation.en: It's a pleasure. Welcome to Paris.
So, you've come to teach the French some American tricks?
translation.zh:
‎你是来教法国人
‎一些美国人的招数吗？

translation.en: I'm sure we have a lot to learn from each other.
translation.zh:
‎我相信我们有很多
‎需要互相学习的地方

translation.en: But your experience is not with fashion
-and luxury brands, hm? -[Emily] True.
Most of my experience has been in promoting pharmaceuticals and geriatric care facilities.
translation.zh:
‎我的经验多以推销
‎药物和老人保健设备为主

translation.en: In Chicago.
Yes. I mean, oui.
I was in Chicago once,
-and I ate the deep-dish pizza. -Ah.
That is our specialty.
We take a lot of pride.
It was, uh, dégueulasse. How you say?
-Disgusting. -[Paul chuckles]
-Like a quiche made of cement. -Uh...
translation.zh: ‎像是用洋灰做成的法式咸派

translation.en: Oh, no, you must have gone to Lou Malnati's.
translation.zh: ‎你肯定是去了鲁玛纳蒂披萨屋

translation.en: And the people are so fat.
Why are they all so fat?
Well, perhaps from the disgusting food.
True, we are in the midst of an obesity epidemic.
translation.zh:
‎也对 芝加哥正面临
‎流行性肥胖症的问题

translation.en: In fact, Merck was one of our biggest clients.
translation.zh: ‎默克药厂是我们公司最大的客户

translation.en: They make a diabetes drug that we marketed the heck out of.
translation.zh:
‎该厂做了一种糖尿病药
‎在我们推广下卖得满堂彩

translation.en: Sales went up 63 percent.
So you create the disease, then you treat the disease,
translation.zh: ‎你们制造出疾病 目的是要医治疾病

translation.en: and then you market the treatments of the disease.
-Well... -Perhaps stop eating.
-There is no money in that. -True.
Cigarettes cause diabetes and cancer.
translation.zh: ‎抽烟也足以引发糖尿病和癌症

translation.en: Yes. [chuckles] Well, smoking is a pleasure.
translation.zh: ‎没错 但抽烟是一种享受

translation.en: And without pleasure, who are we?
translation.zh: ‎没有乐趣 我们算什么人？

translation.en: -German? -[Paul chuckling]
Exactly right.
All of the brands we market here, from perfume to cognac to couture,
translation.zh:
‎不论是香水、干邑或服饰
‎我们推广的品牌

translation.en: -are all to do with beauty and refinement. -[Emily] Mm-hmm.
Perhaps you have something to learn from us,
translation.zh: ‎也许你可以从我们身上学到什么

translation.en: but I'm not sure if we have much to learn from you.
translation.zh: ‎但我不确定能不能从你身上学到什么

translation.en: With all due respect, I have been sent here for a reason,
translation.zh: ‎恕我直言 我被调派过来自有原因

translation.en: so if you wouldn't mind, I would really like to share
translation.zh: ‎如果你不介意的话 我很乐意分享

translation.en: some of my ideas about your social media strategies.
translation.zh: ‎我对你们社交媒体营销策略的想法

translation.en: You mean the Twitter and the Snapchat?
Yes. And the Instagram.
Ah, by all means.
[clicks tongue] First, let me apologize for speaking English.
translation.zh: ‎首先 我为只会说英语向大家道歉

translation.en: I did Rosetta Stone on the plane, but it hasn't kicked in yet.
translation.zh:
‎我在飞机上用如师通学过法语
‎只是还没学会

translation.en: -[Paul sighs] -Oh, Patricia doesn't speak English.
Please continue.
For those of you who haven't met me, I'm Emily Cooper,
translation.zh:
‎我想对还没见过我的人说
‎我叫艾米丽库珀

translation.en: and I'm so excited to be here in Paris.
I'm looking forward to getting to know each and every one of you
translation.zh: ‎我很期待认识你们每一个人

translation.en: and, likewise, having you get to know me.
Your name, monsieur?
My name is Luc.
Yes, Luc?
Why are you shouting?
[sighs, quietly] Sorry.
Your company works with some of the biggest brands
translation.zh:
‎你们公司
‎跟不少大名鼎鼎的奢侈品牌合作

translation.en: in the luxury sector, from Chanel to YSL.
translation.zh:
‎你们公司
‎跟不少大名鼎鼎的奢侈品牌合作 ‎包括香奈儿和圣罗兰

translation.en: And that makes Savoir, your company, or, if I may be so bold,
translation.zh:
‎因此你们的公司…
‎请允许我大胆地说一句

translation.en: our company, a brand in itself.
translation.zh: ‎因此我们的公司也自成一个品牌

translation.en: But to build a brand,
you must create meaningful social media engagement.
translation.zh: ‎你们必须有效利用社交媒体

translation.en: May I ask who's responsible for your social media here?
translation.zh:
‎我想知道
‎在座是谁负责社交媒体宣传？

translation.en: Patricia.
Makes sense.
[inhales sharply] Anyway,
it's not just about the number of followers.
It's about content, trust, interest, and engagement.
translation.zh: ‎重点是内容、信任、兴趣和互动

translation.en: Excuse me, but the French are masters of social media.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 法国人可是社交媒体大师

translation.en: True.
But Americans invented it,
translation.zh: ‎但社交媒体是美国人发明的

translation.en: which is why I hope to become a valuable member of your team
translation.zh:
‎所以我希望能成为
‎你们团队中有价值的人才

translation.en: by adding an American point of view to your fabulous French clients.
translation.zh: ‎将美国人的想法融入法国客户群体

translation.en: [in French] It's a disaster.
Paul.
-[Paul] What? -Who is that girl?
It was one of the terms of the sale.
-They send us one of their people. -[boss sighs]
translation.zh: ‎他们会派人过来 别无其他

translation.en: -How long do we have to put up with this? -[sighs] Well, until she decides to leave.
translation.zh: ‎但我们还要忍受多久？ ‎直到她决定离开为止

translation.en: With me as her boss, we'll see how long she lasts.
translation.zh: ‎有我做她的上司 看她能坚持多久

translation.en: Right, I have to go.
[Emily, in English] It's amazing, isn't it?
The entire city looks like Ratatouille.
translation.zh: ‎整个城市就像《料理鼠王》里的场景

translation.en: It's beautiful.
So beautiful.
[boyfriend] Ah. Hey, how was the first day?
Great.
Okay, maybe a few things got lost in translation.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 有几件事因为语言不通闹笑话

translation.en: It took them a minute to realize I was me and not Madeline,
translation.zh: ‎新同事起初没意识到我不是玛德琳

translation.en: but I really feel like I could be a big asset here.
translation.zh: ‎但我认为自己能成为他们很大的助力

translation.en: Hey, look what I got.
[Emily gasps] Thank God! You're gonna love Paris.
translation.zh: ‎谢天谢地！你一定会爱上巴黎的

translation.en: I don't want to spend another day in the most romantic city in the world
translation.zh:
‎这个世界上最浪漫的城市没有你
‎我也不想多待一天

translation.en: -without you. -I'll be there soon, okay?
Hurry. I miss you already here.
translation.zh: ‎快点 我已经开始想念你了

translation.en: Bye.
-[door slams heavily] -[Emily] Ugh, seriously?
God.
[softly] Okay.
Come on.
[grunts] This can't be happening. Come on.
Sorry, I... I thought this was my apartment. Fifth floor?
translation.zh:
‎不好意思 我以为这是我的公寓
‎这是五楼吗？

translation.en: This is the fourth floor.
Fifth floor.
Right.
[chuckles] Uh, I'm Emily. Emily Cooper, your... your new neighbor.
translation.zh: ‎我叫艾米丽 ‎全名艾米丽库珀 是刚搬来的邻居

translation.en: American?
Oui. From Chicago.
Gabriel, French, from Normandy.
translation.zh: ‎我叫加百列 是法国人 来自诺曼底

translation.en: [gasps softly] Oh, I know that beach. Saving Private Ryan.
translation.zh:
‎我知道那个海滩
‎是电影《拯救大兵瑞恩》里的场景

translation.en: -What? -D-Day?
-Uh, anyway. -[both chuckle]
Nice to meet you, neighbor.
[in French] Good morning, miss.
-♪ Get back to the beat... ♪ -[in English] Oh, my God.
-♪ We ain't got no hope ♪ -Oh, my God.
♪ I see you in the darkness, baby ♪
-♪ Surrounded by the moonlight, baby ♪ -Mm. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: ‎（53个粉丝） ‎（黄油+巧克力=爱心） ‎天啊

translation.en: Sylvie, it's Emily. Um, are we closed today,
translation.zh: ‎希薇 我是艾米丽 今天公司不开门

translation.en: or is there a national holiday I don't know about?
translation.zh: ‎还是今天是公共假期 而我不知道

translation.en: 'Cause I've been hanging around here for two hours and...
translation.zh: ‎我足足等了两个小时 而且…

translation.en: -[brakes squeak] -What are you doing?
I've been here since 8:30.
Pourquoi ? We open at 10:30.
-[cell phone chimes softly] -[energetic music playing]
Hi Patricia. I'm wondering if I can share some ideas I have
translation.zh: ‎帕特丽夏 我想要分享一些

translation.en: about how we might enhance our social media engagement.
translation.zh: ‎提升社交媒体互动率的想法

translation.en: I'm so excited about the potential here.
[translator, in French] Patricia, I'd like to share some ideas
translation.zh: ‎帕特丽夏 我想要分享一些

translation.en: about how we might enhance our social media engagement.
translation.zh: ‎提升社交媒体互动率的想法

translation.en: -[in English] Do you wanna have lunch? -No, I'll have a cigarette.
translation.zh: ‎要不要一起吃午餐？ ‎不用了 我抽根烟就行了

translation.en: Uh, I have a... bad stomach.
[clicks tongue] I have a previous engagement.
-Excusez-moi ! [sighs] -[woman] Laurent! Sybil!
[in Mandarin] Apologize to the lady!
[in French] I'm sorry. Can I buy you another one?
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 要不要我赔你一个？

translation.en: [in English] Sorry, I don't speak French.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 我不会说法语

translation.en: -Ah, American? -[Emily] Yes.
But did you think that I was French?
Honestly, no. I was being polite. You... look American.
translation.zh:
‎说真的 我只是不想冒犯你
‎你看起来十足像个美国人

translation.en: Are you from Indiana?
-Chicago. -[woman] Oh. I was close.
I went to junior high in Indianapolis.
translation.zh: ‎我在印第安纳波利斯读高中

translation.en: -Oh, cool. No way! Why? -[woman] Mm-hm.
Ah, long story.
Very boring. [chuckles] The story and... Indianapolis.
translation.zh:
‎我的故事很无聊
‎印第安纳波利斯也是

translation.en: But the girls, they look like you. Nice.
translation.zh:
‎但那边的女孩看起来跟你一样
‎很友善

translation.en: -Are those your children? -[woman] No, I'm their nanny.
translation.zh:
‎-他们是你的孩子吗？
‎-不是 我是他们的保姆

translation.en: [in Mandarin] Laurent! Stay where I can see you.
translation.zh: ‎劳伦 待在我能看到你的地方

translation.en: [sighs, in English] I'm teaching them Mandarin.
How long have you been here?
Uh... almost a year. From Shanghai.
translation.zh: ‎差不多一年了 我来自上海

translation.en: But my mother's from Korea. Another long, boring story.
translation.zh: ‎但我妈是韩国人 这也是说来话长

translation.en: -Do you love it? -Uh, yes, of course I love Paris.
translation.zh: ‎你喜欢法国吗？ ‎当然了 我很喜欢巴黎

translation.en: -And the food is so delicious. -[Emily] Mm.
The fashion, so chic.
The lights, so magical.
But the people... so mean.
-I mean, they can't all be mean. -Oh, yes, they can.
translation.zh:
‎-不是所有人都很刻薄吧
‎-你错了 所有人都很刻薄

translation.en: Chinese people are mean behind your back.
-French people, mean to your face. -[Emily] Mm.
-But you're on vacation here, so... -Oh, no. Actually, I work here.
translation.zh:
‎-幸好你是来度假的 所以…
‎-不是 其实我是来工作的

translation.en: I have a job with a French marketing firm.
translation.zh: ‎我在一家法国营销策划公司上班

translation.en: -[woman] Seriously? -Yeah.
Well, so you know.
Well, I just started.
Oh.
-Do you have any friends in Paris? -Uh, no.
Um... but my boyfriend's coming next week to visit, so...
translation.zh: ‎可是我男朋友下星期会来看我

translation.en: Are you lonely?
No... uh...
-Sometimes. [chuckles softly] -[clicks tongue] Give me your phone.
-[Emily] Uh... -Okay, so here's my number.
[clicks tongue] You're lonely, you text me, we have dinner. I'm Mindy.
translation.zh:
‎寂寞时 不妨发短信给我
‎我们可以一起吃晚餐 我叫敏迪

translation.en: Emily.
Nice to meet you.
-French people do this. -Oh.
Sybil! Laurent!
-[in French] You're not my mother! -I want an ice cream!
translation.zh: ‎你又不是我妈！ ‎我要吃冰淇淋！

translation.en: -[Mindy] Ugh. -[camera shutter clicks] -["Aujourd'hui" playing] -[phone locks]
[in English] What is "la plouc"?
It's a little term of endearment, like, um, mon petit chou, la plouc...
Nice. [chuckles] Don't worry about it.
-[laptop chimes] -[translator] The hick.
Sorry, I don't speak French.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 我不会说法语

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Um, is the seat free?
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 这位子有人吗？

translation.en: -Uh, yes... yes, please. Yeah. -[man] Yeah? Okay.
Thank you.
-Ah, Emily. Ah... -Luc! Hi.
I... I just want to say I am sorry for this.
I... I do not agree to calling you "la plouc."
translation.zh: ‎我认为叫你乡下人是不对的

translation.en: And... I can, uh...?
Y-- yes.
You know... [inhales]
-Mm, I'm good. -Ah? Okay.
You know, we are all a little afraid of you.
What?
-Afraid of me? -Mm-hm.
How?
Y-- your ideas.
They are more new. Maybe they are better.
-[chuckles] -Now you are here, and,
uh, maybe we feel we have to work harder,
translation.zh: ‎我们总觉得必须更努力工作

translation.en: make more money.
It's a balance.
Ex-- exactly. A balance.
And I think the Americans have the wrong balance.
translation.zh: ‎我认为美国人对平衡的定义不对

translation.en: You live to work.
We work to live.
Yes, it's good to make money, but what you say is success,
translation.zh: ‎挣钱固然没错 但你们定义的成功

translation.en: I say is punishment.
But... I enjoy work...
and accomplishment. It... It makes me happy.
translation.zh: ‎也享受成果 这能让我快乐

translation.en: Work makes you happy?
Yes. I mean, it's... it's... it's why I'm here.
translation.zh: ‎对啊 这就是我来巴黎的原因

translation.en: For work.
And look where it's brought me. To this beautiful city.
translation.zh:
‎你瞧 是工作把我带到了
‎这座美丽的城市

translation.en: Maybe you don't know what it is to be happy. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎也许你并不理解什么是快乐

translation.en: Or maybe that's a little arrogant.
translation.zh: ‎你这说法也太自以为是了吧

translation.en: Ah. You came to Paris and you don't speak French.
translation.zh: ‎你来到巴黎 却不会说法语

translation.en: That is arrogant.
More ignorant than arrogant. [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎与其说自以为是 不如说是无知

translation.en: Well, let's call it the arrogance of ignorance.
translation.zh:
‎姑且称之为因为无知
‎所以自以为是吧

translation.en: I'm sorry if I offended you.
translation.zh: ‎如果冒犯了你 我向你道歉

translation.en: Oh, I'm not offended by anything.
I see you tomorrow, Emily. Mm-hm?
Ah. Don't be early.
Oh, hey. There you are.
Is everything okay?
Yeah, I just finally got home from work.
It's 3:00 a.m. here.
Oh... whoops.
It's 7:00 p.m. here.
What are you doin'?
Sleeping.
I miss you so much.
And I miss you too.
-Hello? Doug? -[rustling on phone]
Oh!
Get naked with me.
Are we having cybersex?
Well... if you insist.
-Hold on. [yawns] -[rustling on phone]
[sighs] You better not be recording this.
No. Never.
Oh, wow. You are so beautiful.
Mm, thanks.
Uh, so, um... [exhales]
...you do you, and...
I'll do me.
[sighs] M'kay.
[breathing heavily] That feel good?
-[exhales] Yeah. -How good?
-[pants, moans] -Oh, you're so sexy.
I feel...
Oh, my God.
I feel overwhelmed. I... [breathing heavily]
I feel like myself but not myself, and...
it's all so crazy.
It's crazy, but it's... it's nice, and...
it's kinda sexy, but...
And I...
Doug?
[distorted] Oh, wow.
-Doug? Babe? -[distorted moaning]
Doug?
Oh.
There you are.
[softly] Okay.
[exhales] Okay.
Oh...
my God.
